FIELD.NAME: category
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the category that a program belongs to

FIELD.NAME: sortorder
FIELD.COMMENT: The position of this program within its category

FIELD.NAME: fullname
FIELD.COMMENT: The full name of the program

FIELD.NAME: shortname
FIELD.COMMENT: The short name of the program

FIELD.NAME: idnumber
FIELD.COMMENT: A code that can be used to identify the program

FIELD.NAME: summary
FIELD.COMMENT: A description of the program

FIELD.NAME: endnote
FIELD.COMMENT: A note that will be displayed on completion of the program

FIELD.NAME: visible
FIELD.COMMENT: Determines whether or not users can view the program

FIELD.NAME: availablefrom
FIELD.COMMENT: The date from which the program is available

FIELD.NAME: availableuntil
FIELD.COMMENT: The date after which the program is no longer available

FIELD.NAME: available
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the role that this program is available to

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: The time that this program was created

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The time that this program was last modified

FIELD.NAME: usermodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the user who last modified the program

FIELD.NAME: icon
FIELD.COMMENT: An icon file to represent the program

FIELD.NAME: exceptionssent
FIELD.COMMENT: Keep track of notifying admin of exceptions

TABLE.NAME: prog_courseset
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores details of the sets of courses and competencies contained within a program

FIELD.NAME: programid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the program that this course set relates to

FIELD.NAME: sortorder
FIELD.COMMENT: The position of this course set within the program

FIELD.NAME: competencyid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the competency that contains the courses for this course set (only contains a non-zero value if this course set relates to a competency, otherwise this course set contains individual courses)

FIELD.NAME: nextsetoperator
FIELD.COMMENT: An integer to indicate the type of operator that links this course set with the next set in the program

FIELD.NAME: completiontype
FIELD.COMMENT: Indicates whether or not learners must complete all courses in a set, only one course, etc

FIELD.NAME: timeallowed
FIELD.COMMENT: Denotes the amount of time allowed to complete the course set

FIELD.NAME: recurrencetime
FIELD.COMMENT: The time period for retaking a recurring course

FIELD.NAME: recurcreatetime
FIELD.COMMENT: The length of time before a recurring course ends that the next course should be automatically created by the system

FIELD.NAME: contenttype
FIELD.COMMENT: Defines the type of the content (i.e. set of courses, competency, recurring, etc)

FIELD.NAME: label
FIELD.COMMENT: A name for the set

TABLE.NAME: prog_courseset_course
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the details of the individual courses contained in a course set

FIELD.NAME: coursesetid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the course set that this course relates to

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the course

TABLE.NAME: prog_assignment
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores details of the assignments defined within a program

FIELD.NAME: programid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the program that this assignment relates to id in the prog table

FIELD.NAME: assignmenttype
FIELD.COMMENT: The type of this assignment (i.e. organisation, position, cohort, manager, individual)

FIELD.NAME: assignmenttypeid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the linked assignment

FIELD.NAME: includechildren
FIELD.COMMENT: Indicates whether or not to include the children of the element (if the element has children) when assigning users to this program

FIELD.NAME: completiontime
FIELD.COMMENT: Time indicating either a fixed completion date or a time following a specified event. If no event is specified in the completionevent field, this value is a fixed date. Otherwise it is a time relative to the event.

FIELD.NAME: completionevent
FIELD.COMMENT: Denotes an event by which time the assigned users must complete the program

TABLE.NAME: prog_message
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores details of the messages defined within a program

FIELD.NAME: programid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the program that this message relates to

FIELD.NAME: messagetype
FIELD.COMMENT: Defines the type of message (i.e. program assigned, set due, program due, etc)

FIELD.NAME: sortorder
FIELD.COMMENT: The position of this message within the list of messages

FIELD.NAME: locked
FIELD.COMMENT: Boolean indicating whether or not this message can be moved or deleted

FIELD.NAME: messagesubject
FIELD.COMMENT: The subject of the message

FIELD.NAME: mainmessage
FIELD.COMMENT: The body of the message to be sent to the learner

FIELD.NAME: notifymanager
FIELD.COMMENT: Boolean to indicate whether or not to send a notification to the manager

FIELD.NAME: managermessage
FIELD.COMMENT: The body of the message to the manager

FIELD.NAME: triggertime
FIELD.COMMENT: The time at which this message is sent (this will be in relation to a specific event which will be dependent on the message type)

TABLE.NAME: prog_exception
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores details of any exceptions raised relating to a program

FIELD.NAME: programid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the program that this exception relates to

FIELD.NAME: exceptiontype
FIELD.COMMENT: Denotes the type of this exception (e.g. time allowance, program already assigned, etc)

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the user that this exception relates to

FIELD.NAME: timeraised
FIELD.COMMENT: The time that this exception was raised

FIELD.NAME: assignmentid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the assignment

TABLE.NAME: prog_exception_data
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores details of any data specific to the exceptions raised for a program

FIELD.NAME: exceptionid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the exception that this data item relates to

FIELD.NAME: dataname
FIELD.COMMENT: A string denoting the name of this data item

FIELD.NAME: datavalue
FIELD.COMMENT: The data relating to this data item

TABLE.NAME: prog_completion
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores details of user's program and course set completions

FIELD.NAME: programid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the program that this completion relates to

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the user that this completion relates to

FIELD.NAME: coursesetid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the course set that this completion relates to

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: Indicates the completion status of a program or course set

FIELD.NAME: timestarted
FIELD.COMMENT: The date/time that this program was started by the student

FIELD.NAME: timedue
FIELD.COMMENT: The date/time that this program is due to be completed

FIELD.NAME: timecompleted
FIELD.COMMENT: The time that this program or set was completed

TABLE.NAME: prog_completion_history
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores details of user's program and course set completions history

FIELD.NAME: programid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the program that this completion relates to

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the user that this completion relates to

FIELD.NAME: coursesetid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the course set that this completion relates to

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: Indicates the completion status of a program or course set

FIELD.NAME: timestarted
FIELD.COMMENT: The date/time that this program was started by the student

FIELD.NAME: timedue
FIELD.COMMENT: The date/time that this program is due to be completed

FIELD.NAME: timecompleted
FIELD.COMMENT: The time that this program or set was completed

FIELD.NAME: recurringcourseid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the recurring course that belonged to this program at the time when it was added to the history table

TABLE.NAME: prog_messagelog
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores details of program-related messages that have been issued to a user

FIELD.NAME: messageid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the message that this log item relates to

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the user that this log item relates to

FIELD.NAME: coursesetid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the course set that this log item relates to

FIELD.NAME: timeissued
FIELD.COMMENT: The time that the message was issued

TABLE.NAME: prog_user_assignment
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores details of the user assignments that have been made for a program based on the program's assignment criteria

FIELD.NAME: programid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the program that this user assignment relates to

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the user that this assignment relates to

FIELD.NAME: assignmentid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the linked assignment type

FIELD.NAME: timeassigned
FIELD.COMMENT: The date/time at which this user assignment was made

TABLE.NAME: prog_pos_assignment
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores when users were last assigned a position

TABLE.NAME: prog_recurrence
TABLE.COMMENT: Store the id numbers of the courses that will replace existing courses in a recurring program so that the system can know which course will be used when the current course ends

FIELD.NAME: programid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the program that contains the recurring course

FIELD.NAME: currentcourseid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the course that is the current course in the program

FIELD.NAME: nextcourseid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the course that will replace the current course in the program when it has ended

FIELD.NAME: extensiondate
FIELD.COMMENT: The date to request extension to

FIELD.NAME: extensionreason
FIELD.COMMENT: The reason for requesting an extension

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: Indicates the completion status of a program or course set
